subject: Re: [R] generating correlated Bernoulli random variables
body:
Typo in my previous email:

	sqrt((1-p1)*(1-p2)) should have read sqrt(p1*(1-p1)*p2*(1-p2))

I think!

			cheers,

				Rolf
